concept.title: Trash
concept.shortdesc: The Trash destination drops all records that you pass. Use the Trash destination during development as a placeholder for a real destination. You might also use the Trash destination as a visual representation of a stream of records to drop from the pipeline.

conbody.p: For example, the following pipeline uses the Selector to route data to the Kafka Producer and HBase targets based on different conditions. The Selector routes all records that are not included in either of the other conditions to the Trash destination.
You can configure required fields for the Trash destination. It has no additional properties to configure.
